Text:
I just group all this 7 Cosmos dvds into a single torrent to make easier to share.

You will find inside this torrent a folder named Torrents. This folder contais all the 7 individual torrents with exactly same files my torrent.

You can use these individual torrents to speed up your download just pointing your bittorrent client to the right folder.
